DOC.brief_summary: Many study show soy food soy isoflavones low risk cardiovascular disease ( CVD ) , osteoporosis cancer , human study assess effect purify isoflavone component ( genistein daidzein ) glucose metabolism . This double-blinded , randomize , placebo-controlled trial examine effect purify genistein daidzein glucose metabolism prediabetic diabetic woman . One hundred eighty eligible woman age 30-70 year ( without treatment diabetic drug ) recruit randomly allocate follow three arm : Placebo ( 10g isolate soy protein , ISP ) ; Genistein ( 10g ISP + 50mg genistein ) ; Daidzein ( 10g ISP + 50mg daidzein ) per day 6 mo . Fasting glucose , lipid , insulin , inflammation mark post-load glucose insulin determine 0 , 3th , 6th month . Changes index compare among three group .
